description: The Ski 1/4 Zip Pullover is made of our Merino Pique Knitting technique. We enhanced the interior finish this season with a lightly brushed quality which provides ample next to skin comfort. The front panel stripe detail is new addition this season as well. While we love it best as a base layer, the Voss Color Block Zip-Up is a great multi-use item for hiking, cold weather running and travel... and it looks pretty good too!
name: We Norwegians Ski Zip Up - Mens

specs.value: 17.5 Microns - 94% Superfine Merino, 6% Creora Eco Soft
